settings.title: JOIN OUR TEAM
settings.content: Below you will find our open vacancies.

settings.title: Personal Shopper
settings.content:
We are looking for a someone to join our personal shopping team. This is a fast paced role with a lot of independent working. This is a part time weekend role.

Please send your CV to: contact@found-fashion.com

settings.title: Blogger
settings.content:
We are looking for freelance bloggers to join our team to write engaging and interesting content. This would be a part time paid per article role.

Please send your CV to : contact@found-fashion.com
